Specifics (WNYF article incidents). Education. Personal. Reference.

5 VHS on fire investigations. Several books/print matter on first aid, medical. File with articles etc on Spadafora's writing re: helicopter crash over Hudson. Ref material and CD of photos re: flight 587 crash. Pistol license info handbook. Spadafora's personal fire marshal notepads (1984-86ish). Spadafora's own coursework: management by objectives ref material, fire science. 1912 Lawrence strike ref material. Material re: CFR (certified first responder), including protocols, training, student guide, exercises for fitness, etc. Recruitment flyer for EMT/paramedic. (Includes digital formats)
